Description: Painted pottery shabti of Amunmes, high steward of Amun, with a black lappet-wig, a brown face with black and white eyes, a blue and yellow collar that covers the arms crossed in relief with brown hands; the body is white(faded), the back is decorated with a red and yellow representation of a seed-basket, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs on a yellow ground flanked by red lines.
